website_summaries.verdict: This high-efficiency offering from American Standard is called a right height toilet because it fits both tall people and short people.
pros: Installation is easy, and price is affordable
Uses only 1.1 gallons per flush, which makes it ideal for those watching their water consumption
cons: Occasional complaints about the durability of the handle

customer_reviews.title: Angry
customer_reviews.text: Nov. 16 I bought two of these toilets. Feb. 23 the handle of one of them broke off while a guest was flushing it. As expensive a toilet as this one surely deserves a handle that lasts more than three months. Nevertheless, these are very nice toilets and I would give them at least a 4 rating except for American Standard's Customer Assistance. When I called to complain I was left on hold for 20 minutes before I finally hung up. Evidently they have no intention of helping anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small bathrooms
customer_reviews.text: Nice toilet for small bathrooms. The flush isn’t bad (not as good as the old one). Packaged great!
customer_reviews.author: KimG

customer_reviews.title: Whooooosh!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this to work so well. I remember the old Fergusons that would flush so hard they'd darn near pull you in. This is a very similar experience, amazing that it uses water so much more efficiently. As I have replaced a five gallon dinosaur and have a well, this should make a significant difference in my power bill as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A DeJaeger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent standard toilet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent standard toilet. Very easy to install for a woman who has never installed a toilet before. My husband did the lifting, which was most of the work. The flush is very strong. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: They must have head up a##!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not even gonna rate! Lol, I order an American Standard toilet from Amazon and a package was delivered on time. Just 1 out of 2. It was the bowl, no tank.. Then a note from Amazon saying they where sorry but the other was late. So I waited and cancelled original order & reordered. The second order arrived on time, it was 2 packages and both of them are bowls also! So now I got three bowls & no tanks. I suppose if I can find one tank for a bowl, I can use the other two to plant flowers in next spring! SMH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Harper

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and great work
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively simple to install this toilet. if you follow the instructions you will have it in place within about an hour tops. Make sure that you have the right tools and that you follow the instructions closely. Check the water line to make sure that it's not too old or worn out. This does not come with one and my old one was a mess. To be fair it was from 1969. I really love this little toilet and I'm very proud that I was able to do it by myself
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Made my wife really happy :-)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, uses 1/3 the water our previous toilet used and flushes with twice the force of the older toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Original Vidiot

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Toilet works fantastic and uses much less water than my previous toilet. Flushes with great ferocity.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey I Parigini

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: F'ing amazing! I'm not going to push it with golf balls, but it flushes well and quietly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Hated. Hated these
customer_reviews.text: Hated. Hated these. More costly than in other places and they look like children';s toilet bowls, they are so small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The toilet got here and there was no lid in the box. Little did we know that the seat is sold separately, which was a shock to us seeing as all the pictures show a seat cover as well as the fact that it says it’s a 2 piece set and me not being a pro in plumbing and toilet installation I thought that meant the seat and the toilet itself. All in all it was a huge bummer to have to go pay $80 at Home Depot to buy a seat cover.
customer_reviews.author: abdollah nabavi

customer_reviews.title: Crack in base
customer_reviews.text: This toilet had a crack in bottom of bowl. The crack escalated up and entire toilet cracked into 2 pcs. Too heavy to return it ourselves being UPS never picked it up after 2+ wks. Now stuck with it on front porch. Do ck the base before taking the bowl from box. $211 alot to spend to lose it all...
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: sleek and efficient
customer_reviews.text: It's not a large toilet and, for some, might be TOO small. But I am using it in a smaller bathroom and it is elegant and fits just perfectly. It is proportioned for the room. Seems like a European bathroom or an elegant hotel toilet. Flush is energy/water efficient and STRONG. Small footprint. Would highly recommend but, then again, for those who LIKE smaller toilets like this, this is going to be one that they like. If that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: sait tarhan

customer_reviews.title: American Standard Quality. Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good about this product. It is easy to install, it looks nice, and it appears to be well built. Good job, American Standard. If you need a basic toilet that is not too high and not too large but at a good price, this one's for you. Came incredibly well packaged with no damage at all. The plumber had the old one out and this one in within 20 minutes. Uses less water than the older toilets. The new flush system is noisy but fast and you get use to it. Far less noisey that the old toilets though. I bought a second one for the other bathroom. 5 stars for American Standard. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: ac1957

customer_reviews.title: Specifications for product and listing of everything included.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet itself is great, but it is shown with a toilet seat in the add and did not come with one. If there is to be not toilet seat included it should be shown that way. the add was misleading in this respect. I attempted to discover what all was included at the time of my order, but there was nothing noted in this regard. Should I have gotten a seat?
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: New Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Love this toilet! It replaced a 50s Gerber which was updated. This one uses less water and is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Meischeid

customer_reviews.title: cheap u get what u pay for
customer_reviews.text: good if you need toilet quick and cheap other than that it SUCKS a brand new toilet and i had to take my fill tube out of my old one to put in this new Porcelain Throne because the cheap new fill tube was leaking and bowl would only fill bottom of bowl but i fixed that still flushing like i live in California NOT enough water to flush my kids you know have to plunge it a lot bad toilet
customer_reviews.author: xllxDooMxllx

customer_reviews.title: It was not hit or bumped just spontaneously broke
customer_reviews.text: Six months after install the tank cracked open while I was at work. Came home to water all over my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Tatman

customer_reviews.title: Float Sticks After Maybe 25 Flushes!
customer_reviews.text: Installed this "toilet" a few weeks ago, and the inlet/supply value float began sticking last week. I checked and found no debris, so adjusted the float downward hoping that would help. I didn't. Nor did candle wax, non-petroleum (since the float and tower are plastic) jelly or drenching with WD-40 as last ditch effort. Now I need to spend $25 to get a new float and the joy of installing it on this pile of crap (pun intended). I've purchased several Glacier Bay toilets at Home Depot in past 5 years and NEVER had any problems w/ any of them! I only bought this because my (5'1") wife wanted a lower riding toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Apathycrat

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our replacement of a 10" rough in toilet
customer_reviews.author: JEAN L.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely happy with this toilet and will be purchasing an other one for the second bathroom. I will add the that the is cheap and needed to be replaced the next day. Also the inside arm broke right away too, both were plastic. That being said the actual toilet does save you money and it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: I love this toilet!
customer_reviews.text: It flushes very fast & also refills fast. It's very nice looking. I would highly recommend to everyone, especially those looking for a water saver toilet. It's GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: bjwagner

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for an older toilet in my home. An awesome value for your money. Pros: east to install, attractive, uses very little water, quiet, flushes very efficiently, even with a lot of paper Cons: Does not include seat or wax ring (not a big deal)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and install!
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed it this week! So happy to have a functional toilet that actually flushes! It works well, everything was easy enough for my husband to do in one day while watching the kids. Toys will likely clog it, but I ordered a part to keep the kids out right away.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Byo wax ring and seat for this unit is well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Remodel crew installed two of these for me in a very short time. Literally carried them off UPS truck and plugged them into use/place in minutes... Awesome function of quick low noise low water evacuation and not enough words in the world dictionary to describe how great this unit is!
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great flush!
customer_reviews.text: You just need the wax ring and toilet seat but the rest is all included and already fitted properly in the tank! Not overly heavy so it was an easy install!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Flushes better seat longer comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet flushes all around the bowl. Mimimal cleaning. . EXtra water push down longer.flushes
customer_reviews.author: ezrdrtwo

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived after many months delayed. Received part two with out part one. Very small like for a child. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, small toilet...good price and free delivery.  Doesn't get better than that!
customer_reviews.text: Really purchased this because the price was better than my local home improvement stores and shipping was free. What can I say...a toilet's a toilet. It's pretty small, which is what I needed for my small powder room. It does what it was designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Barbara Francis

customer_reviews.title: works great with very little water
customer_reviews.text: We love this toilet. Comfortable. packaged great. The only reason for the 4 instead of 5 is they didn't include the gasket we ordered. Even so, we like it so much we ordered another for our guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The toilet I received has buttons on top for flushing. It’s not even what I ordered. It’s very flimsy and bad quality. Paid to install it and now I have to replace it again.
customer_reviews.author: Wranga M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We have rental apartments with bathrooms laid out in a certain way. We needed a compact toilet that allows the occupants the most space in the bathroom. Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: in your hair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far working well....what is one to say about a toilet!??
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Esparza

customer_reviews.title: Good value toilet
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two American Standard toilets for our 2 bathrooms..one with elongated seat, one regular. Both work well and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Amendolia, PhD

customer_reviews.title: excellent replacement toilet
customer_reviews.text: needed to replace old toilet - space saver water tank - perfect for regular-sized bathrooms -our 2nd one - first one approx 2 yrs ago & no problems - water saver
customer_reviews.author: ShopNetAlways

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with everything to install
customer_reviews.text: Buy a Kohler instead. No seat, no wax ring, no floor bolts with this purchase. Kohlers come with everything in the box. Buy the time I made the additional purchases the total was already at the higher price. Aldo Kohlers have a superior tank to base mounting mechanism that installs easier and does not leak if the tank is removed later. For instance when you need to paint the walls later. No happy with this design and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CD Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Great value for the price. When it flushes it sounds like a F-18 taking off from a carrier deck. Surprising that it uses so little water. I'm a bigger guy, 5'10" and 215 lbs. Fits me perfectly. Nice to be able to sit comfortably finally. You know Home is where you just trust the toilet! I trust this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anjanette Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for small space
customer_reviews.text: The toilet arrived in good condition and fits my small bathroom very well!
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Hi I’m missing a part The wax ring it was not in the box and holds the toilet bowl on the floor I looked everywhere I had to buy a new one can’t even find me my money five dollars do you want me to take a picture of the Receipt this is tom clayman thanks
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: this works great, and hardly any water use.
customer_reviews.text: this replaced an old commode that barely flushed anything. it is like living in a new age of engineering.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Careful when ordering
customer_reviews.text: American Standard is a great product due to its quality and the price was right, however the picture show the toilet coming with the toilet seat and did not, and the wax rings also were not in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Alcides G.

customer_reviews.title: Flush is strong
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize it doesn’t come with the seat. The size is small and round, good size for an rv.
customer_reviews.author: S.PRO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toilet
customer_reviews.text: Took me a 3 tries to get the fish home not to leak but it has a lot of flush power great toilet
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Very good toilet, but two days late arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Great little toilet and would have given it all stars but it was late in shipping when needed most.
customer_reviews.author: ThePoliteMofo

customer_reviews.title: TOILET SEAT NOT INCLUDED.
customer_reviews.text: this is a okay toilet for the price. my surprise, THERES NOT TOILET SEAT INCLUDED. the images are a bit misleading if you don’t read the fine print. i’ve bought many toilets and to
customer_reviews.author: nice

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Came chipped. Got to put it up. Don't want to wait for a replacement. But still very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: great value and a wonderful product, I got two and love them both
customer_reviews.author: Ronald McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: You're NOT getting everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with the doughnut wax nor the toilet seat. Like who doesn't need that when you purchase a new toilet?
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Leaked
customer_reviews.text: Installed and leaked. There was a crack at the bottom of the tank. The packaging came on two separate days.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ryner

customer_reviews.title: easy delivery
customer_reviews.text: I liked having the toilet here when the plumber could get to me. It was a quick install, saves water use, and looks nice. A winning buy.
customer_reviews.author: gyanna mowr

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Far as I know, it's working great for my roomie.
customer_reviews.author: RozTheLady

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toilet. I bough it to fit in a tight space and it was perfect. Flushes very well and does not use as much water as my last toilet. Packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware the Smell!
customer_reviews.text: Beware the smell! I installed two of these. They work great, better than expected. The only problem is that when flushing solid waste, it leaves an unpleasant odor in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: No seat!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is cheaper by a few dollars than through hardware stores but there's no toilet seat with it, so you end up paying the extra cash anyway. Otherwise a good toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Roffles

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A very good toilet for the money. Good suction and internal mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Poop yourself a favor and get this toilet
customer_reviews.text: For the love of Christ if you think you’re going to change this mug out in two hours without experiance plan on 4. Poops good pees good flushes good
customer_reviews.author: Zach Dihlmann

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service we broke first tank installing our fault but they were so nice and helpful and toilet is amazing water saving and flushes great love it would for sure but again
customer_reviews.author: denisia hines

customer_reviews.title: How do you buy a toilet without a seat??
customer_reviews.text: It said it was a tall toilet it is so low. A mini toilet. It did not have a toilet seat??? I ame without a toilet seat I ordered two toilets. Box came all broken and toilet was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Raquelle busto

customer_reviews.title: Unreasonable price increase ....
customer_reviews.text: Good toilet, but it was a much better deal when it was only $211 just a couple of weeks ago on Amazon! I'll be buying the other two I need somewhere else this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Bott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be shorter than expected but got used to it quickly
customer_reviews.author: Magali Ortiz Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s purpose. Easy to install. Perfect height for a shorter person. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa flosi

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with our new toilet.
customer_reviews.text: We love our new toilet. It uses lest water also.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent buy for the price. Good quality easy installation!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Nice Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Great Toilet. Desperately needed to replace my toilet and amazon delivered it right to my door for free.. Can't beat that...everything works great and was easy to install.....
customer_reviews.author: J. Tlr

customer_reviews.title: Don’t ever buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I won’t buy that product again That was lots of part missing on the toilet and it did Waste my time to install it and uninstalled all So I suggest do not ever buy it I learn my lesson
customer_reviews.author: Himanshu patel

customer_reviews.title: No seat included
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't come with seat. Since my order status is incomplete, i thought its coming. Later contacted vendor and was told seat is not included, but i already installed the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: Without lid
customer_reviews.text: Good product but it does not come with the lid. Without the lid, the price is higher than other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahxxx

customer_reviews.title: great potty
customer_reviews.text: clean, sleek and fits perfectly in my tiny bathroom. the flush is great, efficient in all ways!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken :-(
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these and two arrived with the base broken. Note: These ship in two separate shipments. None of them showed up together. I have had to delay my remodeling date as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Harris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The color is disappointingly OFF-WHITE, not white as stated in the sale post.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but wheres the seat...
customer_reviews.text: i like the 2 stage flush, also works much better than old toilet. I was disipointed it came with no seat. shows one in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a solid, very good-looking toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet for the price. Bought to replace our leaky toilet. Install was a breeze, and the small form factor looks great in our restroom. The toilets flush isn’t as strong as our old vacuity, but for a 1.1gpf I can’t complain. Worst case you can hold the flush handle down for an extra second or two to push solid waste.
customer_reviews.author: David Little

customer_reviews.title: No toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: It ia a very good toilet . But the photo is misleading, it should be without a toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: soonnam Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good purchase for the price it's worth it easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Lionell Everett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't come with seat
customer_reviews.text: Shouldn't show lid in picture of it doesn't come with the toilet also I didn't get the bolts to bolt the toilet down and needed to buy a new connection for the water.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great and sturdy toilet. I love the look of it
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Powerful flush
customer_reviews.text: It has a powerful flush. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilk

customer_reviews.title: Only uses 1 gallon of water!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it flushes in 7 seconds with zero fill-up noise
customer_reviews.author: Gina Scudiero

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet. Well made. It was also well packaged for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: motojo

customer_reviews.title: Flushes well
customer_reviews.text: I have a small bathroom n it works great in the space
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Cat

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: We had to return it because it shattered during the installation. It was thin and very light weight. Didn't come with wax ring or seat. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: What to do with half a toilet?
customer_reviews.text: I received a large box, larger than the one I had picked up for the two piece toilet at Home Depot a couple of years ago. Because of my health problems I had arranged for someone else to install the toilet. Guess what? When the box was opened there was only the base and not the tank. Two guys expecting to install a toilet and no toilet! My refrigerator went out on Friday and I could not have another delivered until Sunday, the prior day. After 52 minutes on the phone I am hoping this gets straightened out. I will update this for sure. Right now, this Prime member for years is not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toilet pretty much ok
customer_reviews.text: Toilet pretty much ok.....the flushing ability (around the edges of the bowl) aren't nearly as good as what was advertised on Amazon. What bothered me most was that had no idea I wasn't buying both pieces. Paid all that money just for the bottom part, which was not clear on the Amazon page. Thank God my old tank (top) was still functional. Was looking forward to all new, but for that much money.....
customer_reviews.author: peter white

customer_reviews.title: this is not fun because I do not have a SUV/truck
customer_reviews.text: My first one was broken by UPS truck. I had to take it to UPS store to return it, this is not fun because I do not have a SUV/truck. My second had a leak from water tank to toilet bowl. It took me an hour to find out the reason. It was the toilet flapper. Install was easy, the price is good! Just check all your parts.
customer_reviews.author: Gon

customer_reviews.title: ... this toilet for almost 6 months and it's absolutely perfect. No issues
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toilet for almost 6 months and it's absolutely perfect. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts and Missing Seat - they write that so ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing Parts and Missing Seat - they write that so small - but NO Parts - with this cost would have just gone to HomeDepo
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: We had to return it.
customer_reviews.text: It was okay except that the tank was cracked so we had to return it. We got a different one locally in case we had to return it again. Toilets are heavy and delicate. We would have been quite happy with it if it had not been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived broken, but second one did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Jill A. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to check for cracks
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t even care it came cracked I didn’t notice till after I set it up I bought for a house I’m remodeling I thought I was gonna just put it on no problem but the tank is all bad . I would most likely love it if it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: BackwoodLui

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price was too high with not having seat included.
customer_reviews.author: Pia mansi

customer_reviews.title: it's a toilet
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and works fine. Isn't that what you want from a toilet? It was priced reasonably. Can't think of anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Tiny toilet! Short and mini. I purchased this for a guest bath but ended up installing in my garage restroom instead. The toilet works fine although it's rarely used. I wouldn't install this if you want a nice toilet for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Most time spent on "prep time" Call it a quick super flush.
customer_reviews.text: American Standard uses a lot of molded foam (to avoid breakage). It took longer to clean tile and old wax residue. I opted for a waxless Fluidmaster #7530. I silicone caulked the seal to the toilet nipple so it wouldn't be a docking disaster. Strange it didn't come with a toilet seat. I bought a quick disconnect Bemis #EC 1521 (quick release molded wood elongated white). The flush is quick and clean. Install this and forget it for at least 30 years. SSJ*
customer_reviews.author: Steve Johnson

product_meta.title: American Standard 288DA114.020 Toilet, Normal Height, White
product_meta.description: Size:Normal Height| Style:Round Front| Color:WhiteThe American standard h2optimum symphonic round front toilet is an ultra high efficiency toilet that meets EPA watersense criteria. An elongated bowl and 16 1/2" rim enhance ease of use. Made of vitreous china, this toilet uses 4.2lpf/1.1gpf. This toilet is audio requirements. With an Everclean surface, this toilet stays cleaner for longer. Sanitary bar and bowl.
feature_bullets: Item may ship in more than one box and may arrive separately
Ultra high efficiency toilet (UHET) uses 1.1 GPF (4.2 LPF)
High efficiency, low consumption, and water sense certified
EverClean surface and installation type is two piece
Siphon jet bowl technology with power wash rim
Seat is not included; Chrome finish trip lever is supplied

specifications.Included Components: Toilet Bowl^Toilet Tank^color matched bolt caps
specifications.Warranty Description: Limited Lifetime Warranty on chinaware. Limited 5-year warranty on all mechanical parts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars254 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
